name: insomnia-plugin-jwt-auth

insomnia.name: jwt-auth-token
insomnia.description: This plugin will auto set the bearer authorization header with a jwt token, after its received from a login api response

author: willvincent
description: This is a plugin for [insomnia](https://insomnia.rest) that will store a jwt token after successful login to an api, and automatically send it to all further requests that should be authenticated.
